---
id: get-mix-task-info
title: "GetMixTaskInfo"
description: "Query related information based on the specified stream mixing task's taskid."
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/en/server/api-reference/stream-mixing/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>GetMixTaskInfo</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Query related information based on the specified stream mixing task's taskid.

<Note title="Call frequency limit">100 times/second</Note>

## Request
